member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Quippe.ChartManager.ChartCache.inner.ExpirationType
member.summary: Type of expiration to apply to items added to the cache, either absolute or sliding.
member.remarks: Changes to expiration type apply only to future items added to the cache and not to items already in the cache.

member.name: P:Quippe.ChartManager.ChartCache.inner.Expiration
member.summary: Expiration length in minutes of items added to the cache.
member.remarks: Changes to expiration length apply only to future items added to the cache and not to items already in the cache.

member.name: M:Quippe.ChartManager.ChartCache.inner.LoadChart(System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the specified chart in the cache indexed by the specified key, provided the key is not already used.
member.param: The key by which to retrieve the cached chart.
Name associated with a change dependency monitor, which can be signaled to remove the cached item, e.g., a category name or domain/region name, such as "Patient/admin".
member.remarks: If the key is already used in the cache, the existing indexed item in the cache is not replaced, and the chart specified in the parameters is not added to the cache. The specified chart is only added if the key is not already used. To replace an existing chart and reuse a keu, remove the existing chart first.

member.name: M:Quippe.ChartManager.ChartCache.LoadChart(System.String,Quippe.ChartManager.CachedChart,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the specified chart in the cache, indexed by the specified key, and using the specified dependency name for monitoring.
member.param: Unique key by which to retrieve the cached chart.
A name used for dependency monitoring.

remarks.para: Throws an ArgumentNullException if the Key or Chart is Nothing.
A dependency monitor with the specified dependency name will be added to the cache with the chart. The monitor can be signaled (using the dependency name) to automatically removed the chart.

member.name: P:Quippe.ChartManager.ChartManagerService.Region
member.summary: An optional category used to group patient data when caching patient charts.

remarks.para: If specified, the Region is prepended to the patient ID to form the cache key for storing or retrieving patient charts from the cache. This allows multiple clients using different service instances with patient data dependent on username (as in the demo services) to maintain control over how patient data is cached. For instance, Region could be used to distinguish patient data by user name (e.g., "[domain]/[username]/[patientId]") in service implementations that store patient data by user name, as is the case in the Quippe demo services. If Region is empty the cache key is of the form "[domain]/[patientId]"
